node.title: The $35 hardware in your home that could cost you $14,000
node.alt: A woman's hand reaches out to turn off a kitchen tap.
node.description: There's a hidden flood risk in your home and it has absolutely nothing to do with the rain, or your drains. But it could cost you tens of thousands of dollars if you don't sort it out.Â
node.content:
["As the weather turns sticky and warm and beaches beckon for summer holidays, it's the season to check your taps or risk tens of thousands of dollars' worth of water damage.", "Since January 2018, insurance company RACQ has received 9651 claims for water damage to homes, with burst pipes and hoses connected to dishwashers and taps a common cause of those claims.", "Spokeswoman Kirsty Clinton said the average cost of flexi hose related claims rings in at $14,145.", "
The hidden flood risk under your sink
", "", "
Flexi hoses are cheap\u00a0and a common feature under the sinks of household kitchens and bathrooms.(ABC Brisbane: Ellen-Maree Elliot)
", "Master Plumbers Association of Queensland technical services manager Ernie Kretschmer said the hoses were in most modern homes and could \"burst at any time if they are damaged.\"", "He said incorrect installation and corrosive chemicals stored under the sink could shorten the lifespan of the hoses \u2013 which are a rubber tube wrapped in braided steel.", "\"If you liken it to a hernia, once that outer wall is compromised, the inner tube can herniate out and burst,\" he said.", "\"Then you've got the full bore of the pipe delivering water under your kitchen sink or in the basement or behind your toilet and that will continue to run until you isolate it,\" he said.", "The reason for rise in claims over the festive season is that no-one is home to turn off the water mains when those pipes burst \u2014 so switch off your water mains when you go away.", "
Flexi hoses can cause 'extreme' damage
", "Ms Clinton said flexi hoses started to deteriorate after ten years and home owners should check whether they have one\u00a0installed in their homes and if they were nearing expiry.", "\"The other important factor on top of the costs to consider is the distress and inconvenience that incidents of this nature can cause individuals and families, where treasured possessions can be ruined, and homes can even be uninhabitable for periods of time.\"", "
How to stop your house from flooding
", "", "
Yarra Valley Water is advising people in 88 suburbs in Melbourne to boil their drinking water because of potential contamination.(Supplied: Pixabay)
", "Mr Kretschmer said home owners or renters could \"poke [their]\u00a0head under the sink and have a look\" for damage on the hose \u2013 like kinks, stains, rust marks, or fraying.", "\"If you do have any concerns or if you do pick up some damage or some kinks or something like that, you would have to call a plumber.\"", "Some flexi hoses can retail at major hardware stores for as little as $35 but Ms Clinton said cheap DIY flexi hoses, which were not rated for the pressure or heat, were a growing concern for the RACQ.", "Mr Kretschmer warned home owners against doing any plumbing themselves.", "\"Where you might have issues with your insurance is if we're looking at a DIY situation where the home owner has gone to a hardware and done some plumbing themselves,\" he said.", "\"Now, that's illegal.\"", "", "
Corrosive chemicals under the sink could accelerate the erosion\u00a0of\u00a0flexi hoses over time.(ABC Radio Brisbane: Jessica Hinchliffe)
"]
